description: Defines a single condition to match a single field of a claim.  A single condition is needed for each claim field to be matched.

fieldPath.description: Since claims can be nested, the full path to a field must be provided. For example, the path to a GA4GH visa type would be: '$ga4gh_passport_v1.ga4gh_visa_v1.type'.  The '$' represents the root, while '.' is the hierarchy delimiter.

operator.name: ClaimOperator
operator.description: Defines the operation to be used to match the value to a claim.

enum.name: like
enum.description: Allows wild card matches to values.  One or more '%' characters can be used in value for wild cards.

enum.name: equals
enum.description: An exact match to the provided value.

value.description: The expected value to match.  Note: Use '%' as the wild card character for like condition.

brokerRedirectUrl.description: The redirect URL of the broker that will provide this passport visa claim.
